alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 1:58PM MDT until June 28 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE AND EXTREME NORTH-CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 158 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Ellsworth Air Force Base, or 16 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder and Hereford. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 67 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
